summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2016 LITTLE GUY MYPOD TRAILER (NA). THE CONTACT TOOK THE TRAILER TO AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC FOR ROUTINE INSPECTION. THE MECHANIC FOUND THAT THE TRAILER CHASSIS AND THE LATERAL SUPPORT BARS ON BOTH SIDES WERE FRACTURED. THE TRAILER WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER AND DEALER WAS CONTACTED VIA PHONE AND EMAIL. *TT *AS  *TR    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).*JB  *AS  *TR
